接口的使用
org.apache.catalina.UserDatabase

  • 使用UserDatabase的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina  
    org.apache.catalina.mbeans  
    org.apache.catalina.realm
    This package contains Realm implementations for the various supported realm technologies for authenticating users and identifying their associated roles.
    org.apache.catalina.users  

    • org.apache.catalina中UserDatabase的使用

      返回UserDatabase的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      UserDatabase User.getUserDatabase()
      Return the UserDatabase within which this User is defined.
      UserDatabase Role.getUserDatabase()
      Return the UserDatabase within which this Role is defined.
      UserDatabase Group.getUserDatabase()
      Return the UserDatabase within which this Group is defined.

    • org.apache.catalina.mbeans中UserDatabase的使用

      参数类型为UserDatabase的org.apache.catalina.mbeans中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected void GlobalResourcesLifecycleListener.createMBeans(java.lang.String name, UserDatabase database)
      Create the MBeans for the specified UserDatabase and its contents.

    • org.apache.catalina.realm中UserDatabase的使用

      声明为UserDatabase的org.apache.catalina.realm中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected UserDatabase UserDatabaseRealm.database
      The UserDatabase we will use to authenticate users and identify associated roles.

    • org.apache.catalina.users中UserDatabase的使用

      实现UserDatabase的org.apache.catalina.users中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  MemoryUserDatabase
      Concrete implementation of UserDatabase that loads all defined users, groups, and roles into an in-memory data structure, and uses a specified XML file for its persistent storage.
      返回UserDatabase的org.apache.catalina.users中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      UserDatabase MemoryUser.getUserDatabase()
      Return the UserDatabase within which this User is defined.
      UserDatabase MemoryRole.getUserDatabase()
      Return the UserDatabase within which this role is defined.
      UserDatabase MemoryGroup.getUserDatabase()
      Return the UserDatabase within which this Group is defined.
      abstract UserDatabase AbstractRole.getUserDatabase()
      Return the UserDatabase within which this Role is defined.
      abstract UserDatabase AbstractGroup.getUserDatabase()
      Return the UserDatabase within which this Group is defined.
